title: BEST LOCATION: Sunny 1BR plus Den in Great Bucktown Location!
posting_body: Available NOW!
Get 1/2 month FREE for 8/1 lease start (or $600 off a 9/1 lease) 12-month lease minimum.
One-bedroom plus Den in A+ Bucktown location.
1 block to 606 access for biking, jogging, rollerblading.
10 minute walk to six corners (North/Milwaukee/Damen), 5 minute walk to Clybourn Metra, 2 blocks from expressway, 10 minute walk to new Mariano's.
Less than 5 minute walk to the BEST neighborhood hangouts such as Lottie's Pub, Bucktown Pub, Jane's, Cortland's Garage, and Club Lucky.
5 minute walk to N. Damen boutiques
Full rehab of kitchen, bathroom, appliances, electrical, plumbing, laundry, etc.
Bluetooth ceiling speakers in bathroom.
Nest thermostat.
Wired with ethernet jacks.
Kitchen features new quartz countertops, Bosch dishwasher, GE stainless appliances, including 5-burner range, microwave and fridge with ice-maker and filtered water dispenser, and garbage disposal.
High efficiency washer/dryer laundry in unit.
Spacious bathroom with all new fixtures, custom tile, night light, ceiling speakers with bluetooth, modern light fixtures, etc.
Bedroom will fit queen bed with large closet.
Access to courtyard for grilling / lounging.
Central A/C, high laundry in unit, access to basement storage.
New paint, hardwood flooring (refinished), and custom 2" blinds throughout.
High-speed Cat-6e ethernet ports throughout (1000Mbs broadband internet with WiFi available for an additional $50mo.).
No Security Deposit, instead a $200/person non-refundable move-in fee.
Income (3x monthly rent), credit, criminal and prior landlord checks.
$25 per person application fee.
Pets allowed with approval and fee.
search terms: Bucktown, 60622, 60647, West Town, Ukrainian Village, Logan Square, Clybourn Metra River West, Blue Line, Kennedy Expressway 90/94, North & Damen, six corners
Listed by an Illinois licensed Broker with an ownership interest.
